title: Miami Heat 's revenue 2001 to 2019
summary: Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2011/12 and 2012/13.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 210.0 was reported at Year 2015/16
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 91.0 was reached at Year 2002/03
